description:
Vancouver Python Day 2016: nine talks from Vancouver Python developers, plus bonus lightning talks.
1. Click: A Pleasure to Write, a Pleasure to Use
2. Making the Most out of Code Reviews
3. Protect Your Users with Circuit Breakers
4. Live Coding in Python
5. The Highs and Lows of a Python Data stack
6. Python in the NHL Front Office
7. Deciding between Continuity and Change in Open Source
8. Open Source and You
9. Ship It: Python Packaging and Distribution
title: Vancouver Python Day 2016
